thread.title: Alia, KJo, Varun proudly celebrate "#3YearsOfSOTY

title: Alia, KJo, Varun proudly celebrate "#3YearsOfSOTY
text: Alia, KJo, Varun proudly celebrate "#3YearsOfSOTY Monday, 19 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) *New Delhi, Oct.19 (ANI): Karan Johar's 2012 hit 'Student of the Year' has completed three years and its stars are proud to be a part of the venture.* New Delhi, Oct.19 (ANI): Karan Johar's 2012 hit 'Student of the Year' has completed three years and its stars are proud to be a part of the venture. Expressing her happiness, Bollywood actress Alia Bhatt tweeted, "#3YearsOfSOTY today. My most Shaandaar moment in life was my first day of SOTY.. THANK YOU." The '2 States' actress continued, "Couldn't have asked for a better way to begin our journey journey ;) thank yo @S1dharthM & @Varun_dvn #3YearsOfSOTY." Varun Dhawan, who played the role of 'Rohan Nanda' in the rom- com, took to Twitter to write, "just realised its been #3YearsOfSOTY.will never forget those moments.made a lot of friends. thank you @karanjohar for creating rohan. Have such amazing memories of all my lovely co stars and everyone involved with the film thank you." Film maker Karan, who is shooting for his upcoming movie 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil', tweeted, "#3YearsOfSOTY.so proud of @S1dharthM @Varun_dvn @aliaa08." The film, which starred Rishi Kapoor and Ronit Roy in the supportive roles, is remembered for its phenomenal music and was among the biggest hits of 2012.(ANI)
